overview: Come and watch what happens when the camera is rolling...and the girls are by themselves! We've give 6 hot chicks the chance to put the camera in their hands and get crazy. They're behind closed doors now, so who knows what they'll do, but there's one thing for sure...it's just her and the camera - and it's priceless.
tagline: A Girl And Her Camera: Priceless.
title: I Film Myself 4
